lead_paragraph: Readers say Mr. Sanders provides a “plausible” steppingstone, and discuss Hillary Clinton’s vulnerability to G.O.P. pressure in foreign policy.

headline.print_headline: Taking a Long View of Sanders’s ‘Revolution’
headline.main: Taking a Long View of Bernie Sanders’s ‘Revolution’

snippet: Readers say Mr. Sanders provides a “plausible” steppingstone, and discuss Hillary Clinton’s vulnerability to G.O.P. pressure in foreign policy.
